definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Reed root flavour Kennedy sex cold, can clear away heat carambola.
sentences.chinese: 蘆根味甘性寒，能清熱生津。

sentences.english: Objective To make a rapid determination of ferulic acid and identification of its structure in rhizome of Phragmites communis (RPC).
sentences.chinese: 目的對蘆根中阿魏酸含量和結構進行快速測定和分析。

definition: Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
dodder (Cuscuta sinensis, a parasitic vine with seeds used in medicine)
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
variant of 黃檗|黄檗[huang2 bo4]
